amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Homeland Security to establish procedures for expeditiously clearing individuals whose names have been mistakenly placed on the TSA Watch List, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4619 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4619 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Durbin. (consideration: CR S7494-7496) To require the Secretary of Homeland Security to establish procedures for expeditiously clearing individuals whose names have been mistakenly placed on the TSA Watch List, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4619 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4619 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Durbin.
